As of Prawn 0.3, it is possible to generate a Euro using the built-in AFM files. However, you need to be sure to manually add spacing around it, as its calculated width in the AFM files seem to be wrong.

We are investigating this issue, but it does not seem to be Prawn specific. If you need precision spacing, use a TTF file instead and the issue will go away.
